All Implemented Interfaces:
Adapter, Filterable, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter
public class SpinnerAdapter_NewIssueCateg
extends ArrayAdapter<Category>

This is the adapter for the spinner in Activity_NewIssueA. Custom spinner with category icon and text dynamically retrieved from the SQLite

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis, Dr. Post-doctoral Researcher, Information Technologies Institute, ITI-CERTH, Thermi, Thessaloniki, Greece ververid@iti.gr, http://mklab.iti.gr
